entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hay River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hay River/Merlyn Carter Airport 10:40 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -40.0°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
